comment: She is such a kind professor who clearly wants you to succeed. She has weekly office hours and provides everything you need to ace the tests. This course had no mandatory homework and was solely graded by tests, but the lecture videos allow anyone to get a 100 on each test.

3 open note tests you have a week to work on and just submit your work. made a 100 on all 3. homework is on Aleks and is only 10% of your grade w/ unlimited attempts. Easiest class I have ever taken. Didn't even look over the work and only did the tests every so often and homework all in one day. Easiest 100 I have ever made. I took it online.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: take her!!! i passed this class with a 100 and i'm not even a math person. her homework is optional and you get a 100 even if u don't do it. her tests so are easy and she gives u A WEEK to do them. she grades based on 3 tests which gives u no room to fail but she offered ec many times. she's so sweet and honestly the most chill professor ive had.
SUCH AN AMAZING PROFESSOR!!! Please take her! I took her online stats class and it was a BREEZE. She's so sweet so don't think twice just take her!

Professor Taasoobshirazi made this class extremely easy. Homework is optional. There are three tests and an exam at the end of the course. You have to take each test all week, and test 3 can be exempted if you score high enough on the FCAR. Highly recommend this professor!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: BEST PROFESSOR AT KSU!  Only 4 test which are super easy. I had forgot to submit one of them and I didn't realize until a week later and she still let me submit with no points off. She also offers zoom meeting every Saturday if you need help. If you want an Easy "A' take her.

If you want to quickly get stats out the way, then I highly recommend taking her. She's not a harsh grader at all and homework is basically optional, but still very helpful. There are only a few exams and they're all pretty easy. You don't have to take the final if you do well enough on the exam before.
She was very patient and lenient with grading. Would recommend.

Amazing statistics professor and class! Homework for about every unit, 3 tests, and the FCAR is a mandatory test. Taking this class was the best decision I made for my first semester at KSU. The extended deadlines took a lot of pressure off when dealing with all other classes! Her video explanations of each unit's material helped as well.

Elementary statistics 
Amazing professor, take this class if you have the chance! She does optional Saturday zoom meetings if you don't understand something. tests are open note
Easiest class you'll ever take. If I ever need another math class I hope this lady teaches it. Cannot recommend her enough.
Best professor I have ever had. Cares about the students and their time.

Great professor, but cancels class a lot. I think I've been to less than 5 classes so far this semester. Good at teaching. Doesn't post much on D2L, so you definitely have to check your email for surprise assignments.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Took her online Probability and Data Analysis. Easy A. No homework. Just 3 tests and you're done. Easy grader too. Did not learn much but as an engineer who cares about statistics? lol easy af
Great teacher, highly recommend taking her!

4 open note tests (word doc, week to complete) plus minor homework per chapter. Tests graded easy. However, lecture videos long and badly put together (lots of jumping around, lack of structure). Lecture slides have lots of format issues and are pasted from the textbook. Easy A but don't take if you want to actually learn.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: So there are only 4 tests and Aleks but if u hate Aleks, she replaces the grade for ur highest test grade. All her tests are easy. She's great at teaching so show up to class! Towards the end ppl didn't show up so that upset her so try ur best not to do that. She cares so ask as many questions and she will help you no matter what. EASY A CLASS FR!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: If you are taking her online, she is a really easy going teacher. She sticks to her syllabus. Her tests are easy and open notes. Basically if you take her you understand the material as well as you will pass the class with an A.
Very sweet and considerate professor. I took her online summer course. Will answer any problems if you ask for help. Very lenient grading.

Definitely the sweetest professor I have ever had. She genuinely just wants students to succeed. Only met for the class like 60% of the time because she wants to give students breaks from lectures. Tests are virtual and you have an entire week to do them. She really is such a kind-hearted lady, I highly recommend!

Professor T was probably one of my favs by far, not too many assignments other than aleks hw and test but it's all so easy and online. She gives a full week to take the test and aleks hw is all due b may. She cares about her students to where she will give us breaks during lectures and asks to make sure we understand everything.

Definitely a easygoing and caring professor because she will stop and explain the questions if you ask her to however can be a bit lecture/ppt heavy overall. Easy class as long as you get the ALEKs assignments done and tests turned in one time.

Sweeeetest professor, cares about her students, always willing to help, easy class, responds very quickly to emails. I was super nervous to take STAT because I didn't take it in high school, and, if you had the same situation, take this prof!!!! Grades based on a few at-home tests, experiment critiques, and ALEKS. 11/10 recommend. :)

Words cannot describe how much I love this Professor. She is a gift to students her tests are easy don't be scared by the fact your grades are determined by 4 tests. As long as you pay attention to her lecture videos and do the ALEKS homework and attend some of her optional meetings. You will pass with flying colors. TAKE HER!

A great statistics professor, but more importantly, one of the kindest and most amazing people you will ever meet. Always willing to offer help and will explain things as much as is needed until students get it.
the literal best human on this Earth. If you can take her class DO IT!!!
She is an amazing teacher. She teachers us very well and she wants everyone to pass. Take her, no regrets.

I've never been really good at math and I tried to take calculus twice before this class and dropped it. I took this class and I've never understood math so well. Prof. Taasoobshirazi is a godsend among professors and I would take her class time and time again. I am not sure where she is from (last name), but she speaks clear English.

I'm not very good at math but Professor T is one of the most helpful , understanding professors at KSU. You can tell she really cares about if you understand the material. 3 tests ,3 critiques and homework that you have the whole semester to do. Attendance isn't mandatory but she'll give you extra credit. TAKE HER! You won't regret it.

Take her if you can!! Amazing professor who is very knowledgeable and helpful. She is so patient and will walk you through everything you need to know. Attendance was not mandatory so most of the class didnt show up, but she gave the people who attended extra credit. Not many assignments, 3 critiques & 3 tests. Replies and grades quickly!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: She's such a wonderful teacher! Her lectures were always clear and well thought, and she was always open to feedback to help us learn better. 2 tests and homework assignments were our only grades. It's easy to fall behind a little but not to difficult to catch up
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: Prof T is great! Shes super kind and her class is an easy A. 2 take home tests and homework activities that are due at the end of the semester. She has office hours where she answers any questions you have about homework or the tests and works through them with you.
PLEASE TAKE HER!!! 2 exams with critiques, homework every 2 weeks. she is very sweet! you will not regret.

Take her!! She is so sweet and amazing. Her class was not overwhelming and her test was easy. she helped with the test and answered any questions you have. The tests are take home and the homework is due at the end of the semester.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: She's amazing! Super easy and slow pacing, very willing to work with you to make sure you understand all concepts. Reasonable grader and generous with time. Super sweet and very obviously cares about your experience. Amazing professor 11/10

Prof T is very kind. This class was very easy to understand with her short video lectures. The tests were open note and and you could get help during office hours. HW assignments are due at the end of the semester and only 2 tests
Her lectures and material are exceptionally organized. She makes difficult material very easy, always available, and very caring.
An absolute angel who cares about and respects her students. Ive always been bad at math but she made the class amazing and easy to understand and I got my first A in a math class.

Professor T. makes this class beyond easy. She gives great feedback and allows you to fix your mistakes if you have made an effort. Although her lectures can be somewhat boring, she gives you all the information you will need. Just do the homework and show up and you will be fine.
literally a blessing u wont regret. all her tests are take home and she gives u a week to do them and lets you use notes and stuff

The best stats teacher out there. She makes it super easy to understand and will take the extra step to help you understand the material. She emails back fast and is available outside of class. One of my favorite teachers for sure. Take her!!!

This professor deserves the best teacher on Earth award! She is incredibly reasonable and understanding! She does not make the class harder than it has to be. I am almost BEGGING that you take her course, so that you can experience the joy that I have. 3 tests and some homework. Youll do fine!

Literally sent from the heavens to teach. She is very soft-spoken and can be a bit nervous at times, but honestly she is the best professor I've ever had. Caring, wants you to succeed, and you WILL do very well if you practice. Loved her!

Honestly, I dont even deserve a professor as amazing as this in my life. She is not only the most understanding person Ive ever met, she also just goes far above and beyond any other professor. God sent this professor down himself to make sure the students were being taken care of.

This professor is amazing. She is easily one of the best professors I have had for any stat class. She is very flexible with scheduling and will let the class out early often because she feels that doing more problems is more beneficial than just listening to a lecture. She answers any question in class thoroughly, and wants students to do well.

Such a good professor!! She really goes at the pace the class needs to understand the material. Homework is not difficult and she will answer all questions you have in class about it before you have to turn it in. Definitely take her if you can!!
Very caring instructor. Can get nervous but it is because she cares and wants to do such a good job for the students.
Actually amazing. She cares and helps students, very knowledgeable, and actually really hot.
Awesome professor! Really cares about teaching, and she was willing to meet outside of class to provide extra instruction.
